O

Order - Class in Model
A mirror of the "order" table from the "schooldb" database.
Order() - Constructor for class Model.Order
The empty constructor is used by the SQL queries.
Order(int, String, double) - Constructor for class Model.Order
A parameterized constructor is used to create an instance of an order with the following pre-set fields.
orderBLL - Variable in class Controller.OrderGUIController
 
OrderBLL - Class in BusinessLogic
Based on the request of the controller, it manages the raw input given, validates it, transforms it into essential client data and then applies one of the CRUD operations
OrderBLL() - Constructor for class BusinessLogic.OrderBLL
Initializes client, product, order and order details data access objects
orderButton - Variable in class Presentation.GUI
 
orderDAO - Variable in class BusinessLogic.OrderBLL
 
OrderDAO - Class in DataAccesObject
The order data access object are defined here This class extends the genericDAO class.
OrderDAO() - Constructor for class DataAccesObject.OrderDAO
 
OrderDetail - Class in Model
A mirror of the "client" table from the "schooldb" database.
OrderDetail() - Constructor for class Model.OrderDetail
The empty constructor is used by the SQL queries.
OrderDetail(int, int, int) - Constructor for class Model.OrderDetail
A constructor that sets for the orderID order a product given by the productID
orderDetailDAO - Variable in class BusinessLogic.OrderBLL
 
OrderDetailDAO - Class in DataAccesObject
The order details data access object are defined here This class extends the genericDAO class.
OrderDetailDAO() - Constructor for class DataAccesObject.OrderDetailDAO
 
orderGUI - Static variable in class Controller.OrderGUIController
 
OrderGUI - Class in Presentation
The view of the orders management part
OrderGUI(JFrame) - Constructor for class Presentation.OrderGUI
It "inherits" the frame from the menu
OrderGUIController - Class in Controller
Controls all the buttons presented in the OrderGUI It calls upon an orderBLL to come and handle the requests made by the user
